name: Angela Narciso Torres
bio: Angela Narciso Torres is author of the poetry collections What Happens is Neither (Four Way Books, 2020) and Blood Orange (Willow Books, 2013). Her work has appeared in Poetry magazine, Missouri Review, and Quarterly West. A graduate of Harvard Graduate School of Education and the Warren Wilson MFA Program for Writers, she has received fellowships from the Bread Loaf Writers' Conference, the Illinois Arts Council, and the Ragdale Foundattion. Born in Brooklyn and raised in Manila, she serves as a senior and reviews editor for RHINO. She lives in Southern California.
